pr_title: timetracking: add timer warning colors and ability to sort timers.

timeline.message:
timetracking: add timer warning colors and ability to sort timers.

Lets the user sort by ascending or descending time.
Lets the user choose a time for showing a timer warning in orange.
Closes #7240

Co-authored-by: jakewilson <jakewilsonfl@gmail.com>

timeline.author: dekvall

+		position = 5
